sys_script.name: UpdateTemp

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_complicatedw_weathersnapshot</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_complicatedw_weathersnapshot">unitVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="unit" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>UpdateTemp</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gr =  new GlideRecord('x_snc_complicatedw_weathersnapshot'); 
	gr.get = (current.sys_id);
	
	var temp = null;
	var newTemp = null; 
	
	if (gr.unit == "C")
		{
			//send temp to F 
			temp = (gr.temp * 1.8) + 32;
			newTemp = Math.round(temp);
			gr.temp = newTemp;

		}
	else if (gr.unit == "F") {
			//send temp to C
			temp = (gr.temp - 32) * .56;
			newTemp = Math.round(temp);
			gr.temp = newTemp;
		
	}
	
				gs.info(gr.unit);
//	gr.update();
	
 /*   
	var newTemp = null;
	var prevUnit = g_form.getValue('unit');
    var temp = g_form.getValue('temperature');
	

    var toCelcius = function(temp) {
        newTemp = (temp * 1.8) + 32;
        g_form.setValue('temperature', Math.round(newTemp));

    };
    var toFahrenheit = function(temp) {
        newTemp = (temp - 32) * .56;
        g_form.setValue('temperature', +(Math.round(newTemp + "e+2") + "e-2"));

    };

    if (prevUnit == "F") {
        toCelcius(temp);
        
    } else {
        toFahrenheit(temp);
    }
*/
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vladislav.bondarenko@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-31 19:47:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e6a0db07dbfb801022d95ff25e961931</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateTemp</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ComplicatedWeather" source="x_snc_complicatedw">f93d9b75dbb3001022d95ff25e9619bf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ComplicatedWeather">f93d9b75dbb3001022d95ff25e9619bf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e6a0db07dbfb801022d95ff25e961931</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vladislav.bondarenko@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-31 19:53:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e6a0db07dbfb801022d95ff25e961931"/></record_update>
